## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (d07f34702c58c8224f7c6327a05781db50d6d98a39709bfbd63c7c665b1b9d8a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'adminauthserv-paypal' @ 2.9.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
